display_information.name: DocuSynth
display_information.description: Generate token-optimized documentation context for LLMs
display_information.long_description:
DocuSynth AI helps you generate comprehensive documentation optimized for AI consumption. Search existing docs, generate new documentation from topics, GitHub repos, or URLs, and share documentation directly in Slack channels.

Commands:
- /docusynth search <query> - Search your documents
- /docusynth generate <topic> - Generate new documentation
- /docusynth list - List recent documents
- /docusynth share <doc-id> - Share a document
- /docusynth help - Show available commands
